g.title: cbam_flow
g.text: CBAM Flow: F → Channel Att → Spatial Att → F'

g.title: odconv_flow
g.text: ODConv Flow: X → [αˢ, αⁱ, αᵒ, αᵏ] → W̃ → Y
W̃ = W ⊙ αˢ ⊙ αⁱ ⊙ αᵒ ⊙ αᵏ

g.title: odconv_complexity
g.text: • Computation: O(C×k) vs O(C²) for CBAM

g.title: odconv_math
g.text: Input: X ∈ ℝᴮˣᶜⁱˣᴴˣᵂ, Kernel W ∈ ℝᶜᵒˣᶜⁱˣᴴᵏˣᵂᵏ
W̃ = W ⊙ αˢ ⊙ αⁱ ⊙ αᵒ ⊙ αᵏ
